SVM_Hum_Elite_Hard_Teach_1H_2_01: A strong swordfighter doesn't just whack at his opponent.
SVM_Hum_Elite_Hard_Teach_1H_2_02: He is aware of his opponent's position. Swing with your body, not just your arm.
SVM_Hum_Elite_Hard_Teach_1H_2_03: Remember that and use it. Then you'll live longer.
SVM_Hum_Elite_Hard_Teach_1H_3_00: Always keep your eye on your opponent.
SVM_Hum_Elite_Hard_Teach_1H_3_01: Some blows can be blocked, others can't.
SVM_Hum_Elite_Hard_Teach_1H_3_02: Recognize the difference. Then you can dodge the blows or even beat your opponent to it.
SVM_Hum_Elite_Hard_Teach_Axe_1_00: Grip the axe firmly with both hands and make sure that you have a solid stance.
SVM_Hum_Elite_Hard_Teach_Axe_1_01: A couple of strong blows, always at the body, should be enough to knock down any opponent.
SVM_Hum_Elite_Hard_Teach_Axe_2_00: The axe is a good weapon for breaking through armor.
SVM_Hum_Elite_Hard_Teach_Axe_2_01: You can do a lot of damage and send your opponent to the ground.
SVM_Hum_Elite_Hard_Teach_Axe_3_00: The axe is a heavy weapon. Use that to your advantage.
SVM_Hum_Elite_Hard_Teach_Axe_3_01: Let it rotate vigorously, and your opponents will drop quickly.
SVM_Hum_Elite_Hard_Teach_Bow_2_00: You have to be fast, but you also have to remain calm.
SVM_Hum_Elite_Hard_Teach_Bow_2_01: You need a steady hand and a good eye.
SVM_Hum_Elite_Hard_Teach_Bow_2_02: Otherwise, you're just wasting your arrows.
SVM_Hum_Elite_Hard_Teach_Crossbow_1_00: Hold the crossbow by the shaft, press it against your shoulder for a steady aim.
SVM_Hum_Elite_Hard_Teach_Crossbow_1_01: For the first few days, it will feel like your shoulder is ready to fall off.
SVM_Hum_Elite_Hard_Teach_Crossbow_1_02: But after just a week, your shoulder will be like a rock!
SVM_Hum_Elite_Hard_Teach_Crossbow_1_03: Aim at your target and pull. That's it.
SVM_Hum_Elite_Hard_Teach_Crossbow_2_00: Learn to estimate the speed of moving targets.
SVM_Hum_Elite_Hard_Teach_Crossbow_2_01: Shoot in your target's path, then you will hit it and also stop it in its tracks.
SVM_Hum_Elite_Hard_Teach_Crossbow_2_02: If you have several targets, then don't waste any time. Instead, nail them all down with targeted shots and then bring them down one after the other.
SVM_Hum_Elite_Hard_Teach_Crossbow_3_00: Don't think. Concentrate on just one thing:
SVM_Hum_Elite_Hard_Teach_Crossbow_3_02: A good marksman can kill his enemy with a single shot.
SVM_Hum_Elite_Hard_Teach_Crossbow_3_03: Use that shot. You only need the one.
SVM_Hum_Elite_Hard_Teach_Hunter_1_00: You have to be careful. Your prey will always be alert.
SVM_Hum_Elite_Hard_Teach_Hunter_1_01: Find a good place to shoot from and aim at the beast's heart.
SVM_Hum_Elite_Hard_Teach_Hunter_2_00: You won't be able to bag large animals with just one shot.
SVM_Hum_Elite_Hard_Teach_Hunter_2_01: Before you can kill it, you have to weaken it.
SVM_Hum_Elite_Hard_Teach_Hunter_2_02: Aim at different vulnerable spots. And be quick so that it doesn't have time to kill you.
SVM_Hum_Elite_Hard_Teach_Hunter_2_03: Once it is weakened, it is only a question of time before you kill it.
SVM_Hum_Elite_Hard_Teach_OrcHunter_00: Take your time and aim at their weak spots.
SVM_Hum_Elite_Hard_Teach_OrcHunter_01: Head, neck, unprotected body parts, you know what I mean.
SVM_Hum_Elite_Hard_Teach_OrcHunter_02: Then send your arrow on its way.
SVM_Hum_Elite_Hard_Teach_OrcHunter_03: Once you are more skilled, you will also do more damage.
SVM_Hum_Elite_Hard_Teach_OrcSlayer_01: The orcs are more broadly and powerfully built than we are.
SVM_Hum_Elite_Hard_Teach_OrcSlayer_02: So, when you strike, hit with real power!
SVM_Hum_Elite_Hard_Teach_OrcSlayer_03: And you can seriously injure an orc with an aimed stab!
SVM_Hum_Elite_Hard_Teach_Shield_1_00: The way of the shield is the way of the soldier. Listen:
SVM_Hum_Elite_Hard_Teach_Shield_1_01: Your shield is your best friend. So always carry it with you!
SVM_Hum_Elite_Hard_Teach_Shield_1_02: It will protect you against most attacks - even against arrows!
SVM_Hum_Elite_Hard_Teach_Shield_1_03: Oh, yes, one more thing. The shield does not belong on your weapon arm!
SVM_Hum_Elite_Hard_Teach_Shield_2_00: Rhobar's army produced a couple of really good shield fighters.
SVM_Hum_Elite_Hard_Teach_Shield_2_01: A strong shield fighter uses blocking tactics.
SVM_Hum_Elite_Hard_Teach_Shield_2_02: Strike from cover - then move the shield back to the front!
SVM_Hum_Elite_Hard_Teach_Shield_2_03: But remember - even the best shield won't protect you against attacks from behind!
SVM_Hum_Elite_Hard_Teach_Sneak_2_00: This is quite different from sneaking up on people!
SVM_Hum_Elite_Hard_Teach_Sneak_2_01: Stalking is the only way to get within reach of a wild animal.
SVM_Hum_Elite_Hard_Teach_Sneak_2_02: Always creep up from behind - and don't think that the animal won't be able to scent you!
SVM_Hum_Elite_Hard_Teach_Sneak_2_03: If you get too close, it's over. So the best weapon for hunting is the bow.
SVM_Hum_Elite_Hard_Teach_TrophyFur_00: Slit the prey open and remove the skin with a jerk!
SVM_Hum_Elite_Hard_Teach_TrophyFur_01: The most important thing is: always from back to front!
SVM_Hum_Elite_Hard_Teach_TrophyFur_02: Once you know how to do it, it's no problem.
SVM_Hum_Elite_Hard_Teach_TrophySkin_01: To lift off the skin, carefully make an incision.
SVM_Hum_Elite_Hard_Teach_TrophySkin_02: Then remove it from back to front - but do it very slowly!
SVM_Hum_Elite_Hard_Teach_TrophyTeeth_00: Above all, you have to make sure that the stuff doesn't splinter.
SVM_Hum_Elite_Hard_Teach_TrophyTeeth_01: Jam your knife deep into the flesh and uncover the trophy.
SVM_Hum_Elite_Hard_Teach_TrophyTeeth_02: Once you're in deep enough, lever it out.

SVM_Hum_Fat_Bearish_Teach_Bow_3_01: Find a rhythm and follow it.

SVM_Hum_Fat_Bearish_Teach_Crossbow_1_00: Hold the crossbow by the shaft, press it against your shoulder for a steady aim.
SVM_Hum_Fat_Bearish_Teach_Crossbow_1_01: For the first few days, it will feel like your shoulder is ready to fall off.
SVM_Hum_Fat_Bearish_Teach_Crossbow_1_02: But after just a week, your shoulder will be like a rock!
SVM_Hum_Fat_Bearish_Teach_Crossbow_1_03: Aim at your target and pull. That's it.
SVM_Hum_Fat_Bearish_Teach_HeavyArmor_00: Most people make the mistake of not putting their armor on properly.
SVM_Hum_Fat_Bearish_Teach_HeavyArmor_01: All parts of the armor must be firmly connected.
SVM_Hum_Fat_Bearish_Teach_HeavyArmor_02: Not so tightly that you cannot move.
SVM_Hum_Fat_Bearish_Teach_HeavyArmor_03: But tightly enough so that there are no weak spots left in the armor.
SVM_Hum_Fat_Bearish_Teach_Hunter_1_00: You have to be careful. Your prey will always be alert.
SVM_Hum_Fat_Bearish_Teach_Hunter_1_01: Find a good place to shoot from and aim at the beast's heart.
SVM_Hum_Fat_Bearish_Teach_Hunter_2_00: You won't be able to bag large animals with just one shot.
SVM_Hum_Fat_Bearish_Teach_Hunter_2_01: Before you can kill it, you have to weaken it.
SVM_Hum_Fat_Bearish_Teach_Hunter_2_02: Aim at different vulnerable spots. And be quick so that it doesn't have time to kill you.
SVM_Hum_Fat_Bearish_Teach_Hunter_2_03: Once it is weakened, it is only a question of time before you kill it.
SVM_Hum_Fat_Bearish_Teach_Mining_01: Swing the pickaxe into the rock and start hacking.
SVM_Hum_Fat_Bearish_Teach_Mining_02: But use regular strokes. Then you'll get more chunks out of the rock.
SVM_Hum_Fat_Bearish_Teach_OrcSlayer_01: The orcs are more broadly and powerfully built than we are.
SVM_Hum_Fat_Bearish_Teach_OrcSlayer_02: So, when you strike, hit with real power!
SVM_Hum_Fat_Bearish_Teach_OrcSlayer_03: And you can seriously injure an orc with an aimed stab!
SVM_Hum_Fat_Bearish_Teach_SharpenBlade_0: Go to the whetstone and let it rip.
Slowly draw the blade from left to right, and hone it evenly.
That makes it nice and sharp.
SVM_Hum_Fat_Bearish_Teach_Smith_2_01: The principle is the same as in forging weapons.
SVM_Hum_Fat_Bearish_Teach_Smith_2_02: Heat the blank, work it, cool it.
SVM_Hum_Fat_Bearish_Teach_Smith_2_03: But of course, a magic ore weapon needs a magic ore blank.
SVM_Hum_Fat_Bearish_Teach_Sneak_2_00: This is quite different from sneaking up on people!
SVM_Hum_Fat_Bearish_Teach_Sneak_2_01: Stalking is the only way to get within reach of a wild animal.
SVM_Hum_Fat_Bearish_Teach_Sneak_2_02: Always creep up from behind - and don't think that the animal won't be able to scent you!
SVM_Hum_Fat_Bearish_Teach_Sneak_2_03: If you get too close, it's over. So the best weapon for hunting is the bow.
SVM_Hum_Fat_Bearish_Teach_TrophyFur_00: Slit the prey open and remove the skin with a jerk!
SVM_Hum_Fat_Bearish_Teach_TrophyFur_01: The most important thing is: always from back to front!
SVM_Hum_Fat_Bearish_Teach_TrophyFur_02: Once you know how to do it, it's no problem.
SVM_Hum_Fat_Bearish_Teach_TrophySkin_01: To lift off the skin, carefully make an incision.
SVM_Hum_Fat_Bearish_Teach_TrophySkin_02: Then remove it from back to front - but do it very slowly!
SVM_Hum_Fat_Bearish_Teach_TrophyTeeth_00: Above all, you have to make sure that the stuff doesn't splinter.
SVM_Hum_Fat_Bearish_Teach_TrophyTeeth_01: Jam your knife deep into the flesh and uncover the trophy.
SVM_Hum_Fat_Bearish_Teach_TrophyTeeth_02: Once you're in deep enough, lever it out.

SVM_Hum_Old_Wise_Teach_Druid_01: Every creature that you change into will be all the stronger.
SVM_Hum_Old_Wise_Teach_Druid_02: That is the secret of the druids.
SVM_Hum_Old_Wise_Teach_FireArrow_00: Fire arrows do more damage than conventional arrows.
SVM_Hum_Old_Wise_Teach_FireArrow_01: It's actually quite simple. You need arrows and the necessary ingredients.
SVM_Hum_Old_Wise_Teach_FireArrow_02: Assemble them on an alchemist's bench.
SVM_Hum_Old_Wise_Teach_Firemage_00: This knowledge will lend great strength to all magic spells of fire.
SVM_Hum_Old_Wise_Teach_Firemage_01: This knowledge is the highest gift of Innos himself.
SVM_Hum_Old_Wise_Teach_Firemage_02: The true power of the fire is with you!
SVM_Hum_Old_Wise_Teach_HeavyArmor_00: Most people make the mistake of not putting their armor on properly.
SVM_Hum_Old_Wise_Teach_HeavyArmor_01: All parts of the armor must be firmly connected.
SVM_Hum_Old_Wise_Teach_HeavyArmor_02: Not so tightly that you cannot move.
SVM_Hum_Old_Wise_Teach_HeavyArmor_03: But tightly enough so that there are no weak spots left in the armor.
SVM_Hum_Old_Wise_Teach_Hunter_1_00: You have to be careful. Your prey will always be alert.
SVM_Hum_Old_Wise_Teach_Hunter_1_01: Find a good place to shoot from and aim at the beast's heart.
SVM_Hum_Old_Wise_Teach_Hunter_2_00: You won't be able to bag large animals with just one shot.
SVM_Hum_Old_Wise_Teach_Hunter_2_01: Before you can kill it, you have to weaken it.
SVM_Hum_Old_Wise_Teach_Hunter_2_02: Aim at different vulnerable spots. And be quick so that it doesn't have time to kill you.
SVM_Hum_Old_Wise_Teach_Hunter_2_03: Once it is weakened, it is only a question of time before you kill it.
SVM_Hum_Old_Wise_Teach_Learn_00: Of course you do. You are an inquisitive man.
SVM_Hum_Old_Wise_Teach_Learn_01: So, use your time and use your head.
SVM_Hum_Old_Wise_Teach_Learn_02: It isn't there just to hold up your helmet...
SVM_Hum_Old_Wise_Teach_LightArmor_00: You have to tighten it properly. Pull all the laces, strings, and straps nice and tight.
SVM_Hum_Old_Wise_Teach_LightArmor_01: But the trick is tightening. Tighten it properly, and it will protect you better!
SVM_Hum_Old_Wise_Teach_MasterMage_00: It is a great gift that slumbers in each of us.
SVM_Hum_Old_Wise_Teach_MasterMage_01: It is your will that awakens it. Concentrate your will.
SVM_Hum_Old_Wise_Teach_MasterMage_03: Practice this, and it will soon feel like it's always been that way.
SVM_Hum_Old_Wise_Teach_Mining_01: Swing the pickaxe into the rock and start hacking.
SVM_Hum_Old_Wise_Teach_Mining_02: But use regular strokes. Then you'll get more chunks out of the rock.
SVM_Hum_Old_Wise_Teach_PotionMP_00: Ah! Mana potions. Their power develops in their effect.
SVM_Hum_Old_Wise_Teach_PotionMP_01: They are a source of pure magic power.
SVM_Hum_Old_Wise_Teach_PotionMP_02: There are various recipes for these potions.
SVM_Hum_Old_Wise_Teach_PotionMP_03: So get yourself one, find the necessary ingredients, and go for it!
SVM_Hum_Old_Wise_Teach_PotionPerm_01: With this knowledge, you'll be able to brew ANY permanent potion.
SVM_Hum_Old_Wise_Teach_PotionPerm_02: All you need is a recipe and the required ingredients.
SVM_Hum_Old_Wise_Teach_PotionPerm_03: Most ingredients are very rare, so you will be out and about a lot.
SVM_Hum_Old_Wise_Teach_PotionTransform_0: Transformation potions allow you to take on another form for a short time.
It goes without saying that you need the necessary ingredients and an alchemist's bench!
SVM_Hum_Old_Wise_Teach_ResistCold_00: You have to move a lot, that warms the body.
SVM_Hum_Old_Wise_Teach_ResistCold_01: Every movement must come from your whole body.
SVM_Hum_Old_Wise_Teach_ResistCold_02: And make sure that you always have warm feet.
SVM_Hum_Old_Wise_Teach_SharpenBlade_00: Go to the whetstone and let it rip.
SVM_Hum_Old_Wise_Teach_SharpenBlade_01: Slowly draw the blade from left to right, and hone it evenly.
SVM_Hum_Old_Wise_Teach_SharpenBlade_02: That makes it nice and sharp.
SVM_Hum_Old_Wise_Teach_Smith_2_01: The principle is the same as in forging weapons.
SVM_Hum_Old_Wise_Teach_Smith_2_02: Heat the blank, work it, cool it.
SVM_Hum_Old_Wise_Teach_Smith_2_03: But of course, a magic ore weapon needs a magic ore blank.
SVM_Hum_Old_Wise_Teach_Sneak_2_00: This is quite different from sneaking up on people!
SVM_Hum_Old_Wise_Teach_Sneak_2_01: Stalking is the only way to get within reach of a wild animal.
SVM_Hum_Old_Wise_Teach_Sneak_2_02: Always creep up from behind - and don't think that the animal won't be able to scent you!
SVM_Hum_Old_Wise_Teach_Sneak_2_03: If you get too close, it's over. So the best weapon for hunting is the bow.
SVM_Hum_Old_Wise_Teach_Sprinter_00: Breathing is the most important thing. If you breathe wrong, you will soon be winded.
SVM_Hum_Old_Wise_Teach_Sprinter_01: Breathe evenly and draw the air deep into your lungs. Then you'll always have some when you need it.
SVM_Hum_Old_Wise_Teach_Sprinter_02: And the absolutely most important thing: don't panic!
SVM_Hum_Old_Wise_Teach_StaffMagic_00: Take the staff in your hands and feel its energy.
SVM_Hum_Old_Wise_Teach_StaffMagic_01: Probe this energy and bring it into harmony with your spirit.
SVM_Hum_Old_Wise_Teach_StaffMagic_02: Only then can you merge the powers of the staff with your own.
SVM_Hum_Old_Wise_Teach_Staff_1_00: A staff is awfully long. You can use that to keep your opponents at bay.
SVM_Hum_Old_Wise_Teach_Staff_1_01: If you strike properly, almost no one will have a chance against you.
SVM_Hum_Old_Wise_Teach_Staff_2_00: Your opponent will always underestimate a staff. It doesn't seem as dangerous as a sword or an axe.
SVM_Hum_Old_Wise_Teach_Staff_2_01: Use that. There are maneuvers that aren't possible with a sword.
SVM_Hum_Old_Wise_Teach_Staff_2_02: If you can surprise your opponent, you've almost won.
SVM_Hum_Old_Wise_Teach_TrophyFur_00: Slit the prey open and remove the skin with a jerk!
SVM_Hum_Old_Wise_Teach_TrophyFur_01: The most important thing is: always from back to front!
SVM_Hum_Old_Wise_Teach_TrophyFur_02: Once you know how to do it, it's no problem.
SVM_Hum_Old_Wise_Teach_TrophySkin_01: To lift off the skin, carefully make an incision.
SVM_Hum_Old_Wise_Teach_TrophySkin_02: Then remove it from back to front - but do it very slowly!
SVM_Hum_Old_Wise_Teach_TrophyTeeth_00: Above all, you have to make sure that the stuff doesn't splinter.
SVM_Hum_Old_Wise_Teach_TrophyTeeth_01: Jam your knife deep into the flesh and uncover the trophy.
SVM_Hum_Old_Wise_Teach_TrophyTeeth_02: Once you're in deep enough, lever it out.
SVM_Hum_Old_Wise_Teach_Watermage_00: This knowledge enables you to unfold the true power of the magic of Adanos.
SVM_Hum_Old_Wise_Teach_Watermage_01: You will understand nature, and it will reinforce your spells.
SVM_Hum_Old_Wise_ThisTimeYoureLucky: I'll let you get away with it this time.
SVM_Hum_Old_Wise_WillKillAllSuspects: If this doesn't stop, we'll have to kill everyone we don't trust completely.
SVM_Hum_Old_Wise_WillKillSuspect: Once we find the guilty party, we'll make short work of them.
SVM_Hum_Old_Wise_WillTakeNoMoreRisks: I am no longer prepared to take a risk!
SVM_Hum_Old_Wise_YouKnowTheAnswer: You can answer that question yourself.
SVM_Hum_Slave_Clever_JoinRefuse: You already have someone traveling with you!
SVM_Hum_Slave_Clever_LookingForTroubleAg: Are you looking for another fight?
SVM_Hum_Slave_Clever_MobDismiss: We'll meet at the assembly point!
SVM_Hum_Slave_Clever_NotEnoughGold: You don't have enough gold with you!
SVM_Hum_Slave_Clever_NotEnoughLP: You don't have the necessary experience!
SVM_Hum_Slave_Clever_PartyDismiss: You know where to find me.
SVM_Hum_Slave_Clever_Teach_Acrobatic_00: Body control is a good thing.
SVM_Hum_Slave_Clever_Teach_Acrobatic_01: It helps you safely survive a fall from a great height!
SVM_Hum_Slave_Clever_Teach_ImmuneToPoiso: Poison is a nasty business, especially when it's in your body.
You have to make sure that your body breaks down the poison as quickly as possible.
Keep moving and sweat a lot. That should spare you the results of the poison.
SVM_Hum_Slave_Clever_Teach_LightArmor_00: You have to tighten it properly. Pull all the laces, strings, and straps nice and tight.
SVM_Hum_Slave_Clever_Teach_LightArmor_01: But the trick is tightening. Tighten it properly, and it will protect you better!
SVM_Hum_Slave_Clever_Teach_PoisonBlade_0: First, you need a weapon and the poison.
Avoid dunking the whole blade in the poison.
Apply it in a thin coat only on the edge and the tip.
And make sure that you don't cut yourself.
SVM_Hum_Slave_Clever_Teach_PotionMP_00: Ah! Mana potions. Their power develops in their effect.
SVM_Hum_Slave_Clever_Teach_PotionMP_01: They are a source of pure magic power.
SVM_Hum_Slave_Clever_Teach_PotionMP_02: There are various recipes for these potions.
SVM_Hum_Slave_Clever_Teach_PotionMP_03: So get yourself one, find the necessary ingredients, and go for it!

SVM_Hum_Slave_Clever_Teach_PotionPerm_02: All you need is a recipe and the required ingredients.
SVM_Hum_Slave_Clever_Teach_PotionPerm_03: Most ingredients are very rare, so you will be out and about a lot.

SVM_Hum_Slave_Clever_Teach_StaffMagic_01: Probe this energy and bring it into harmony with your spirit.
SVM_Hum_Slave_Clever_Teach_StaffMagic_02: Only then can you merge the powers of the staff with your own.

SVM_Hum_Slave_Clever_Teach_Staff_1_01: If you strike properly, almost no one will have a chance against you.
SVM_Hum_Slave_Clever_Teach_Staff_2_00: Your opponent will always underestimate a staff. It doesn't seem as dangerous as a sword or an axe.
SVM_Hum_Slave_Clever_Teach_Staff_2_01: Use that. There are maneuvers that aren't possible with a sword.
SVM_Hum_Slave_Clever_Teach_Staff_2_02: If you can surprise your opponent, you've almost won.
SVM_Hum_Slave_Defiant_AdanosTeacher_00: Sometimes a fight can't be avoided. Now you have the weapons you need.
SVM_Hum_Slave_Defiant_AdanosTeacher_01: Adanos has chosen you to wield his magic. Use it well!
SVM_Hum_Slave_Defiant_AdanosTeacher_02: You bear a great power. Use it for the good of the world.
SVM_Hum_Slave_Defiant_LookingForTroubleA: Do really want to tangle with me again?
SVM_Hum_Slave_Defiant_MobDismiss: We'll meet at the assembly point!
SVM_Hum_Slave_Defiant_NotEnoughGold: You don't have enough gold with you!
SVM_Hum_Slave_Defiant_NotEnoughLP: You don't have the necessary experience!
SVM_Hum_Slave_Defiant_PartyDismiss: You know where to find me.
SVM_Hum_Slave_Defiant_RevolutionHero: Now everything here belongs to us!
SVM_Hum_Slave_Defiant_Teach_Barter_00: No, I can't do that. You'll have to pay more for that.
SVM_Hum_Slave_Defiant_Teach_Barter_01: Listen! I paid you, so teach me!
SVM_Hum_Slave_Defiant_Teach_Barter_02: But look - you can already do it.
SVM_Hum_Slave_Defiant_Teach_Barter_03: When you're trading, you'll see that you get better prices.
SVM_Hum_Slave_Defiant_Teach_Excuse_00: A useful skill if you ever have trouble with the guards.
SVM_Hum_Slave_Defiant_Teach_Excuse_01: The important thing is to come across convincingly.
SVM_Hum_Slave_Defiant_Teach_Excuse_02: So, speak with a firm voice and look the guy straight in the eye!
SVM_Hum_Slave_Defiant_Teach_Excuse_03: Then you assert something, anything. Just don't say, 'I can explain'!
SVM_Hum_Slave_Defiant_Teach_KnockOut_00: You've only got one chance. If your blow isn't just right, there will be a fight - and you want to avoid that.
SVM_Hum_Slave_Defiant_Teach_KnockOut_01: So, creep up on the unsuspecting victim from behind and hit him exactly in the spot between the neck and the head.
SVM_Hum_Slave_Defiant_Teach_KnockOut_02: If you strike hard enough, he'll collapse like a cheap tent.
SVM_Hum_Slave_Defiant_Teach_Lockpick_2_0: Ah, you want to get at the really valuable stuff.
Hold the lockpick with just your fingertips. Then you have more feeling.
You can tell if you push the locking mechanism in the right direction from the noise it makes.
SVM_Hum_Slave_Defiant_Teach_Pickpocket_1: Involve your victim in a conversation.
You wouldn't believe how carelessly some people secure their purses. Often, you can just pull them from their pockets.
SVM_Hum_Slave_Defiant_Teach_Pickpocket_2: No problem. You have enough talent for that.
Basically, you don't have to do anything other than what you've done in your earlier thefts:
Look your opponent straight in the eye. Most people find that unpleasant, and it distracts them.

SVM_Hum_Warrior_Bearish_SecondMurder: We are still looking for the murderer!
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Bearish_SecondTheft: More and more of our people's valuables are disappearing.
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Bearish_Teach_1H_2_01: A strong swordfighter doesn't just whack at his opponent.
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Bearish_Teach_1H_2_02: He is aware of his opponent's position. Swing with your body, not just your arm.
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Bearish_Teach_1H_2_03: Remember that and use it. Then you'll live longer.
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Bearish_Teach_1H_3_00: Always keep your eye on your opponent.
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Bearish_Teach_1H_3_01: Some blows can be blocked, others can't.
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Bearish_Teach_1H_3_02: Recognize the difference. Then you can dodge the blows or even beat your opponent to it.
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Bearish_Teach_Axe_1_00: Grip the axe firmly with both hands and make sure that you have a solid stance.
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Bearish_Teach_Axe_1_01: A couple of strong blows, always at the body, should be enough to knock down any opponent.
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Bearish_Teach_Axe_2_00: The axe is a good weapon for breaking through armor.
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Bearish_Teach_Axe_2_01: You can do a lot of damage and send your opponent to the ground.
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Bearish_Teach_Axe_3_00: The axe is a heavy weapon. Use that to your advantage.
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Bearish_Teach_Axe_3_01: Let it rotate vigorously, and your opponents will drop quickly.
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Bearish_Teach_Bow_2_00: You have to be fast, but you also have to remain calm.
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Bearish_Teach_Bow_2_01: You need a steady hand and a good eye.
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Bearish_Teach_Bow_2_02: Otherwise, you're just wasting your arrows.
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Bearish_Teach_Bow_3_00: The bow has to become a part of you, an extension of your arm.
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Bearish_Teach_Bow_3_01: Find a rhythm and follow it.
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Bearish_Teach_Bow_3_02: When your mind, your heart, and your breath follow that rhythm, your arrows will find their target by themselves.
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Bearish_Teach_Crossbow_1: Hold the crossbow by the shaft, press it against your shoulder for a steady aim.
For the first few days, it will feel like your shoulder is ready to fall off.
But after just a week, your shoulder will be like a rock!
Aim at your target and pull. That's it.
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Bearish_Teach_Crossbow_2: Learn to estimate the speed of moving targets.
Shoot in your target's path, then you will hit it and also stop it in its tracks.
If you have several targets, then don't waste any time. Instead, nail them all down with targeted shots and then bring them down one after the other.
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Bearish_Teach_Crossbow_3: Don't think. Concentrate on just one thing:
A good marksman can kill his enemy with a single shot.
Use that shot. You only need the one.
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Bearish_Teach_HeavyArmor: Most people make the mistake of not putting their armor on properly.
All parts of the armor must be firmly connected.
Not so tightly that you cannot move.
But tightly enough so that there are no weak spots left in the armor.
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Bearish_Teach_Hunter_1_0: You have to be careful. Your prey will always be alert.
Find a good place to shoot from and aim at the beast's heart.
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Bearish_Teach_Hunter_2_0: You won't be able to bag large animals with just one shot.
Before you can kill it, you have to weaken it.
Aim at different vulnerable spots. And be quick so that it doesn't have time to kill you.
Once it is weakened, it is only a question of time before you kill it.
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Bearish_Teach_Mining_01: Swing the pickaxe into the rock and start hacking.
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Bearish_Teach_Mining_02: But use regular strokes. Then you'll get more chunks out of the rock.
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Bearish_Teach_OrcHunter_: Take your time and aim at their weak spots.
Head, neck, unprotected body parts, you know what I mean.
Then send your arrow on its way.
Once you are more skilled, you will also do more damage.
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Bearish_Teach_OrcSlayer_: The orcs are more broadly and powerfully built than we are.
So, when you strike, hit with real power!
And you can seriously injure an orc with an aimed stab!
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Bearish_Teach_ResistCold: You have to move a lot, that warms the body.
Every movement must come from your whole body.
And make sure that you always have warm feet.
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Bearish_Teach_SharpenBla: Go to the whetstone and let it rip.
Slowly draw the blade from left to right, and hone it evenly.
That makes it nice and sharp.
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Bearish_Teach_Shield_1_0: The way of the shield is the way of the soldier. Listen:
Your shield is your best friend. So always carry it with you!
It will protect you against most attacks - even against arrows!
Oh, yes, one more thing. The shield does not belong on your weapon arm!
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Bearish_Teach_Shield_2_0: Rhobar's army produced a couple of really good shield fighters.
A strong shield fighter uses blocking tactics.
Strike from cover - then move the shield back to the front!
But remember - even the best shield won't protect you against attacks from behind!

SVM_Hum_Warrior_Bearish_Teach_Sneak_2_03: If you get too close, it's over. So the best weapon for hunting is the bow.

The most important thing is: always from back to front!
Once you know how to do it, it's no problem.

Once you're in deep enough, lever it out.

SVM_Hum_Warrior_Calm_FirstTheft: Some valuable things have gone missing here.
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Calm_GuardRefuse: Don't cause any trouble here, got it?!
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Calm_IDontBelieveYou: I don't believe a word of it.
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Calm_ISaidDontGoFurther: One more step in that direction and you won't know what hit you!
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Calm_JoinRefuse: You already have someone with you...
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Calm_KillAllSuspectsNow: Everyone who is suspected of being involved in this will be killed!
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Calm_KnownMurder: You are wanted here for murder!
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Calm_KnownTheft: You are wanted here for theft!
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Calm_LookingForTroubleAg: Do really want to tangle with me again?
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Calm_MobDismiss: We'll meet at the assembly point!
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Calm_NextTimeYoureGuilty: If this goes on, we will hold YOU responsible for everything!
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Calm_NoFriendOfASS: You are no friend of the Hashishin!
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Calm_NoFriendOfEnclave: We do not know if we can trust you.
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Calm_NoFriendOfMID: You are no friend of the forest people.
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Calm_NoFriendOfNOM: You are no friend of the nomads.
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Calm_NoFriendOfNRD: You are no friend of the people of Nordmar.
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Calm_NoFriendOfORC: You are no friend of the orcs.
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Calm_NoFriendOfREB: You are no friend of the rebels.
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Calm_NoMoreTroubleHere: Don't cause any more trouble here!
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Calm_NotEnoughGold: You don't have enough gold with you!
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Calm_NotEnoughLP: You don't have the necessary experience!
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Calm_PartyDismiss: You know where to find me.
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Calm_RevolutionHero: Thanks to you, everything is all right!
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Calm_SecondEnclaveCrime: More and more of our camps are being razed to the ground.
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Calm_SecondMurder: We are still looking for the murderer!
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Calm_SecondTheft: More and more of our people's valuables are disappearing.
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Calm_Teach_1H_2_01: A strong swordfighter doesn't just whack at his opponent.
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Calm_Teach_1H_2_02: He is aware of his opponent's position. Swing with your body, not just your arm.
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Calm_Teach_1H_2_03: Remember that and use it. Then you'll live longer.
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Calm_Teach_1H_3_00: Always keep your eye on your opponent.
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Calm_Teach_1H_3_01: Some blows can be blocked, others can't.
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Calm_Teach_1H_3_02: Recognize the difference. Then you can dodge the blows or even beat your opponent to it.
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Calm_Teach_Axe_1_00: Grip the axe firmly with both hands and make sure that you have a solid stance.
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Calm_Teach_Axe_1_01: A couple of strong blows, always at the body, should be enough to knock down any opponent.
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Calm_Teach_Axe_2_00: The axe is a good weapon for breaking through armor.
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Calm_Teach_Axe_2_01: You can do a lot of damage and send your opponent to the ground.
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Calm_Teach_Bow_2_00: You have to be fast, but you also have to remain calm.
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Calm_Teach_Bow_2_01: You need a steady hand and a good eye.
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Calm_Teach_Bow_2_02: Otherwise, you're just wasting your arrows.
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Calm_Teach_Bow_3_00: The bow has to become a part of you, an extension of your arm.
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Calm_Teach_Bow_3_01: Find a rhythm and follow it.
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Calm_Teach_Bow_3_02: When your mind, your heart, and your breath follow that rhythm, your arrows will find their target by themselves.
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Calm_Teach_Crossbow_1_00: Hold the crossbow by the shaft, press it against your shoulder for a steady aim.
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Calm_Teach_Crossbow_1_01: For the first few days, it will feel like your shoulder is ready to fall off.
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Calm_Teach_Crossbow_1_02: But after just a week, your shoulder will be like a rock!
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Calm_Teach_Crossbow_1_03: Aim at your target and pull. That's it.
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Calm_Teach_Crossbow_2_00: Learn to estimate the speed of moving targets.
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Calm_Teach_Crossbow_2_01: Shoot in your target's path, then you will hit it and also stop it in its tracks.
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Calm_Teach_Crossbow_2_02: If you have several targets, then don't waste any time. Instead, nail them all down with targeted shots and then bring them down one after the other.
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Calm_Teach_Hunter_1_00: You have to be careful. Your prey will always be alert.
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Calm_Teach_Hunter_1_01: Find a good place to shoot from and aim at the beast's heart.
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Calm_Teach_Hunter_2_00: You won't be able to bag large animals with just one shot.
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Calm_Teach_Hunter_2_01: Before you can kill it, you have to weaken it.
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Calm_Teach_Hunter_2_02: Aim at different vulnerable spots. And be quick so that it doesn't have time to kill you.
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Calm_Teach_Hunter_2_03: Once it is weakened, it is only a question of time before you kill it.
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Calm_Teach_JumpAttack_01: You have to jump at the right time - you should jump at your opponent!
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Calm_Teach_JumpAttack_02: Strike while you are in the air - and with real force.
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Calm_Teach_JumpAttack_03: That way, you deal your opponent a hefty blow!
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Calm_Teach_OrcHunter_00: Take your time and aim at their weak spots.
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Calm_Teach_OrcHunter_01: Head, neck, unprotected body parts, you know what I mean.
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Calm_Teach_OrcHunter_02: Then send your arrow on its way.
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Calm_Teach_OrcHunter_03: Once you are more skilled, you will also do more damage.
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Calm_Teach_PotionMP_00: Ah! Mana potions. Their power develops in their effect.
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Calm_Teach_PotionMP_01: They are a source of pure magic power.
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Calm_Teach_PotionMP_02: There are various recipes for these potions.
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Calm_Teach_PotionMP_03: So get yourself one, find the necessary ingredients, and go for it!
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Calm_Teach_PotionPerm_01: With this knowledge, you'll be able to brew ANY permanent potion.
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Calm_Teach_PotionPerm_02: All you need is a recipe and the required ingredients.
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Calm_Teach_PotionPerm_03: Most ingredients are very rare, so you will be out and about a lot.
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Calm_Teach_Shield_1_00: The way of the shield is the way of the soldier. Listen:
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Calm_Teach_Shield_1_01: Your shield is your best friend. So always carry it with you!
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Calm_Teach_Shield_1_02: It will protect you against most attacks - even against arrows!
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Calm_Teach_Shield_1_03: Oh, yes, one more thing. The shield does not belong on your weapon arm!
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Calm_Teach_Shield_2_00: Rhobar's army produced a couple of really good shield fighters.
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Calm_Teach_Shield_2_01: A strong shield fighter uses blocking tactics.
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Calm_Teach_Shield_2_02: Strike from cover - then move the shield back to the front!
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Calm_Teach_Shield_2_03: But remember - even the best shield won't protect you against attacks from behind!
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Calm_Teach_Sneak_2_00: This is quite different from sneaking up on people!
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Calm_Teach_Sneak_2_01: Stalking is the only way to get within reach of a wild animal.
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Calm_Teach_Sneak_2_02: Always creep up from behind - and don't think that the animal won't be able to scent you!
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Calm_Teach_Sneak_2_03: If you get too close, it's over. So the best weapon for hunting is the bow.
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Calm_Teach_Staff_1_00: A staff is awfully long. You can use that to keep your opponents at bay.
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Calm_Teach_Staff_1_01: If you strike properly, almost no one will have a chance against you.
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Calm_Teach_Staff_2_00: Your opponent will always underestimate a staff. It doesn't seem as dangerous as a sword or an axe.
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Calm_Teach_Staff_2_01: Use that. There are maneuvers that aren't possible with a sword.
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Calm_Teach_Staff_2_02: If you can surprise your opponent, you've almost won.
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Calm_Teach_TrophyFur_00: Slit the prey open and remove the skin with a jerk!
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Calm_Teach_TrophyFur_01: The most important thing is: always from back to front!
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Calm_Teach_TrophyFur_02: Once you know how to do it, it's no problem.
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Calm_Teach_TrophySkin_01: To lift off the skin, carefully make an incision.
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Calm_Teach_TrophySkin_02: Then remove it from back to front - but do it very slowly!
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Calm_Teach_TrophyTeeth_0: Above all, you have to make sure that the stuff doesn't splinter.
Jam your knife deep into the flesh and uncover the trophy.
Once you're in deep enough, lever it out.
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Calm_ThisTimeYoureLucky: I'll let you get away with it this time.
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Calm_WillKillAllSuspects: If this doesn't stop, we'll have to kill everyone we don't trust completely.
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Calm_WillKillSuspect: Once we find the guilty party, we'll make short work of them.
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Calm_WillTakeNoMoreRisks: I am no longer prepared to take a risk!
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Calm_YouKnowTheAnswer: You can answer that question yourself.
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Clear_BetYouAreResponsib: And I bet you're responsible for THAT, too.
I bet YOU are responsible for that!
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Clear_DoYouKnowSomething: I assume you don't know anything about THAT either?!

SVM_Hum_Warrior_Clear_Teach_1H1H_1_02: You can block quickly and strike back fast.

SVM_Hum_Warrior_Clear_Teach_Barter_02: But look - you can already do it.
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Clear_Teach_Barter_03: When you're trading, you'll see that you get better prices.

SVM_Hum_Warrior_Clear_Teach_Excuse_00: A useful skill if you ever have trouble with the guards.
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Clear_Teach_Excuse_01: The important thing is to come across convincingly.
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Clear_Teach_Excuse_02: So, speak with a firm voice and look the guy straight in the eye!
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Clear_Teach_Excuse_03: Then you assert something, anything. Just don't say, 'I can explain'!

SVM_Hum_Warrior_Clear_Teach_Learn_00: Of course you do. You are an inquisitive man.
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Clear_Teach_Learn_01: So, use your time and use your head.
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Clear_Teach_Learn_02: It isn't there just to hold up your helmet...
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Clear_Teach_LightArmor_0: You have to tighten it properly. Pull all the laces, strings, and straps nice and tight.
But the trick is tightening. Tighten it properly, and it will protect you better!
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Clear_Teach_Lockpick_2_0: Ah, you want to get at the really valuable stuff.
Hold the lockpick with just your fingertips. Then you have more feeling.
You can tell if you push the locking mechanism in the right direction from the noise it makes.
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Clear_Teach_Pickpocket_1: Involve your victim in a conversation.
You wouldn't believe how carelessly some people secure their purses. Often, you can just pull them from their pockets.
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Clear_Teach_Pickpocket_2: No problem. You have enough talent for that.
Basically, you don't have to do anything other than what you've done in your earlier thefts:
Look your opponent straight in the eye. Most people find that unpleasant, and it distracts them.

SVM_Hum_Warrior_Dumb_Teach_Crossbow_1_03: Aim at your target and pull. That's it.
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Dumb_Teach_Excuse_00: A useful skill if you ever have trouble with the guards.
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Dumb_Teach_Excuse_01: The important thing is to come across convincingly.
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Dumb_Teach_Excuse_02: So, speak with a firm voice and look the guy straight in the eye!
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Dumb_Teach_Excuse_03: Then you assert something, anything. Just don't say, 'I can explain'!
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Dumb_Teach_Lockpick_2_00: Ah, you want to get at the really valuable stuff.
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Dumb_Teach_Lockpick_2_01: Hold the lockpick with just your fingertips. Then you have more feeling.
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Dumb_Teach_Lockpick_2_02: You can tell if you push the locking mechanism in the right direction from the noise it makes.
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Dumb_Teach_OrcSlayer_01: The orcs are more broadly and powerfully built than we are.
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Dumb_Teach_OrcSlayer_02: So, when you strike, hit with real power!
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Dumb_Teach_OrcSlayer_03: And you can seriously injure an orc with an aimed stab!
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Dumb_Teach_Pickpocket_1_: Involve your victim in a conversation.
You wouldn't believe how carelessly some people secure their purses. Often, you can just pull them from their pockets.
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Dumb_Teach_Pickpocket_2_: No problem. You have enough talent for that.
Basically, you don't have to do anything other than what you've done in your earlier thefts:
Look your opponent straight in the eye. Most people find that unpleasant, and it distracts them.

SVM_Hum_Warrior_Friendly_Teach_Hunter_1_: You have to be careful. Your prey will always be alert.
Find a good place to shoot from and aim at the beast's heart.
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Friendly_Teach_Hunter_2_: You won't be able to bag large animals with just one shot.
Before you can kill it, you have to weaken it.
Aim at different vulnerable spots. And be quick so that it doesn't have time to kill you.
Once it is weakened, it is only a question of time before you kill it.
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Friendly_Teach_Mining_01: Swing the pickaxe into the rock and start hacking.
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Friendly_Teach_Mining_02: But use regular strokes. Then you'll get more chunks out of the rock.
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Friendly_Teach_ResistHea: Move as little as possible and save your strength.
The heat can be more exhausting than fighting a whole herd of monsters.
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Friendly_Teach_Sneak_2_0: This is quite different from sneaking up on people!
Stalking is the only way to get within reach of a wild animal.
Always creep up from behind - and don't think that the animal won't be able to scent you!
If you get too close, it's over. So the best weapon for hunting is the bow.
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Friendly_Teach_TrophyFur: Slit the prey open and remove the skin with a jerk!
The most important thing is: always from back to front!
Once you know how to do it, it's no problem.
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Friendly_Teach_TrophySki: To lift off the skin, carefully make an incision.
Then remove it from back to front - but do it very slowly!
SVM_Hum_Warrior_Friendly_Teach_TrophyTee: Above all, you have to make sure that the stuff doesn't splinter.

SVM_Hum_Young_Clever_Teach_1H1H_1_00: The art of fighting with two weapons demands great concentration.
SVM_Hum_Young_Clever_Teach_1H1H_1_01: You carry two weapons at the same time - so use them.
SVM_Hum_Young_Clever_Teach_1H1H_1_02: You can block quickly and strike back fast.
SVM_Hum_Young_Clever_Teach_1H_2_01: A strong swordfighter doesn't just whack at his opponent.
SVM_Hum_Young_Clever_Teach_1H_2_02: He is aware of his opponent's position. Swing with your body, not just your arm.
SVM_Hum_Young_Clever_Teach_1H_2_03: Remember that and use it. Then you'll live longer.
SVM_Hum_Young_Clever_Teach_1H_3_00: Always keep your eye on your opponent.
SVM_Hum_Young_Clever_Teach_1H_3_01: Some blows can be blocked, others can't.
SVM_Hum_Young_Clever_Teach_1H_3_02: Recognize the difference. Then you can dodge the blows or even beat your opponent to it.
SVM_Hum_Young_Clever_Teach_Axe_1_00: Grip the axe firmly with both hands and make sure that you have a solid stance.
SVM_Hum_Young_Clever_Teach_Axe_1_01: A couple of strong blows, always at the body, should be enough to knock down any opponent.
SVM_Hum_Young_Clever_Teach_Axe_2_00: The axe is a good weapon for breaking through armor.
SVM_Hum_Young_Clever_Teach_Axe_2_01: You can do a lot of damage and send your opponent to the ground.

SVM_Hum_Young_Clever_Teach_Crossbow_1_02: But after just a week, your shoulder will be like a rock!

SVM_Hum_Young_Clever_Teach_Crossbow_2_00: Learn to estimate the speed of moving targets.
SVM_Hum_Young_Clever_Teach_Crossbow_2_01: Shoot in your target's path, then you will hit it and also stop it in its tracks.
SVM_Hum_Young_Clever_Teach_Crossbow_2_02: If you have several targets, then don't waste any time. Instead, nail them all down with targeted shots and then bring them down one after the other.

SVM_Hum_Young_Clever_Teach_KnockOut_00: You've only got one chance. If your blow isn't just right, there will be a fight - and you want to avoid that.
SVM_Hum_Young_Clever_Teach_KnockOut_01: So, creep up on the unsuspecting victim from behind and hit him exactly in the spot between the neck and the head.
SVM_Hum_Young_Clever_Teach_KnockOut_02: If you strike hard enough, he'll collapse like a cheap tent.
SVM_Hum_Young_Clever_Teach_Lockpick_2_00: Ah, you want to get at the really valuable stuff.
SVM_Hum_Young_Clever_Teach_Lockpick_2_01: Hold the lockpick with just your fingertips. Then you have more feeling.
SVM_Hum_Young_Clever_Teach_Lockpick_2_02: You can tell if you push the locking mechanism in the right direction from the noise it makes.
SVM_Hum_Young_Clever_Teach_OrcHunter_00: Take your time and aim at their weak spots.
SVM_Hum_Young_Clever_Teach_OrcHunter_01: Head, neck, unprotected body parts, you know what I mean.
SVM_Hum_Young_Clever_Teach_OrcHunter_02: Then send your arrow on its way.
SVM_Hum_Young_Clever_Teach_OrcHunter_03: Once you are more skilled, you will also do more damage.
SVM_Hum_Young_Clever_Teach_Pickpocket_1_: Involve your victim in a conversation.
You wouldn't believe how carelessly some people secure their purses. Often, you can just pull them from their pockets.
SVM_Hum_Young_Clever_Teach_Pickpocket_2_: No problem. You have enough talent for that.
Basically, you don't have to do anything other than what you've done in your earlier thefts:
Look your opponent straight in the eye. Most people find that unpleasant, and it distracts them.
SVM_Hum_Young_Clever_Teach_Shield_1_00: The way of the shield is the way of the soldier. Listen:
SVM_Hum_Young_Clever_Teach_Shield_1_01: Your shield is your best friend. So always carry it with you!
SVM_Hum_Young_Clever_Teach_Shield_1_02: It will protect you against most attacks - even against arrows!
SVM_Hum_Young_Clever_Teach_Shield_1_03: Oh, yes, one more thing. The shield does not belong on your weapon arm!
SVM_Hum_Young_Clever_Teach_Shield_2_00: Rhobar's army produced a couple of really good shield fighters.
SVM_Hum_Young_Clever_Teach_Shield_2_01: A strong shield fighter uses blocking tactics.
SVM_Hum_Young_Clever_Teach_Shield_2_02: Strike from cover - then move the shield back to the front!
SVM_Hum_Young_Clever_Teach_Shield_2_03: But remember - even the best shield won't protect you against attacks from behind!
SVM_Hum_Young_Clever_Teach_Sneak_2_00: This is quite different from sneaking up on people!
SVM_Hum_Young_Clever_Teach_Sneak_2_01: Stalking is the only way to get within reach of a wild animal.
SVM_Hum_Young_Clever_Teach_Sneak_2_02: Always creep up from behind - and don't think that the animal won't be able to scent you!
SVM_Hum_Young_Clever_Teach_Sneak_2_03: If you get too close, it's over. So the best weapon for hunting is the bow.
SVM_Hum_Young_Clever_Teach_TrophyFur_00: Slit the prey open and remove the skin with a jerk!
SVM_Hum_Young_Clever_Teach_TrophyFur_01: The most important thing is: always from back to front!
SVM_Hum_Young_Clever_Teach_TrophyFur_02: Once you know how to do it, it's no problem.
SVM_Hum_Young_Clever_Teach_TrophySkin_01: To lift off the skin, carefully make an incision.
SVM_Hum_Young_Clever_Teach_TrophySkin_02: Then remove it from back to front - but do it very slowly!
SVM_Hum_Young_Clever_Teach_TrophyTeeth_0: Above all, you have to make sure that the stuff doesn't splinter.
Jam your knife deep into the flesh and uncover the trophy.
Once you're in deep enough, lever it out.
SVM_Hum_Young_Clever_ThisTimeYoureLucky: I'll let you get away with it this time.
SVM_Hum_Young_Clever_WillKillAllSuspects: If this doesn't stop, we'll have to kill everyone we don't trust completely.
SVM_Hum_Young_Clever_WillKillSuspect: Once we find the guilty party, we'll make short work of them.
SVM_Hum_Young_Clever_WillTakeNoMoreRisks: I am no longer prepared to take a risk!
SVM_Hum_Young_Clever_YouKnowTheAnswer: You can answer that question yourself.

SVM_Hum_Young_Naive_AdanosTeacher_02: You bear a great power. Use it for the good of the world.
SVM_Hum_Young_Naive_BetYouAreResponsible: And I bet you're responsible for THAT, too.
I bet YOU are responsible for that!
